1. Plugin Interface (&#96;src/core/plugin.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Required declarations\\\\nA plugin struct must declare:\\\\n- &#96;name: [:0]const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;vendor: [:0]const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;url: [:0]const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;version: [:0]const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;plugin_id: [:0]const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;audio_io_layouts: []const AudioIOLayout&#96;\\\\n- &#96;params: []const Param&#96;\\\\n- &#96;init: fn(*T, *const AudioIOLayout, *const BufferConfig) bool&#96;\\\\n- &#96;deinit: fn(*T) void&#96;\\\\n- &#96;process: fn(*T, *Buffer, *AuxBuffers, *ProcessContext) ProcessStatus&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Optional declarations\\\\n- &#96;midi_input: MidiConfig&#96; (default: &#96;.none&#96;)\\\\n- &#96;midi_output: MidiConfig&#96; (default: &#96;.none&#96;)\\\\n- &#96;reset: fn(*T) void&#96;\\\\n- &#96;save: fn(*T, SaveContext) bool&#96;\\\\n- &#96;load: fn(*T, LoadContext) bool&#96;\\\\n- &#96;state_version: u32&#96; (default: 1)\\\\n- &#96;sample_accurate_automation: bool&#96; (default: false)\\\\n\\\\n### Comptime function: &#96;Plugin(comptime T)&#96;\\\\n- Validates required declarations and types\\\\n- Builds a namespace with:\\\\n  - Metadata (name, vendor, url, version, plugin_id, audio_io_layouts, params)\\\\n  - Parameter ID hash array (&#96;param_ids&#96;)\\\\n  - Sorted parameter lookup table (&#96;param_lookup_table&#96;) for O(log N) ID→index\\\\n  - Helper functions: &#96;init&#96;, &#96;deinit&#96;, &#96;reset&#96;, &#96;process&#96;, &#96;save&#96;, &#96;load&#96;\\\\n  - Flags: &#96;has_reset&#96;, &#96;has_save&#96;, &#96;has_load&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Types\\\\n- &#96;ProcessStatus&#96;: union(enum) with variants: &#96;err([]const u8)&#96;, &#96;normal&#96;, &#96;tail(u32)&#96;, &#96;keep_alive&#96;, &#96;silence&#96;\\\\n- &#96;ProcessContext&#96;: provides transport, input events, output events, sample rate, and parameter access\\\\n- &#96;EventOutputList&#96;: bounded list for output events (note-off, voice-terminated)\\\\n\\\\n### Parameter access in ProcessContext\\\\n- &#96;getFloat(N, index)&#96;, &#96;getInt(N, index)&#96;, &#96;getBool(N, index)&#96;, &#96;getChoice(N, index)&#96;\\\\n- &#96;nextSmoothed(N, index)&#96; for smoothed values\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## 2. Parameter System (&#96;src/core/params.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Parameter types\\\\n- &#96;FloatParam&#96;: continuous float with linear or logarithmic range\\\\n- &#96;IntParam&#96;: discrete integer range\\\\n- &#96;BoolParam&#96;: boolean\\\\n- &#96;ChoiceParam&#96;: enum with labels\\\\n\\\\n### Range types\\\\n- &#96;FloatRange&#96;: linear mapping (normalize/unnormalize)\\\\n- &#96;LogFloatRange&#96;: logarithmic mapping\\\\n- &#96;IntRange&#96;: integer mapping with step count\\\\n\\\\n### Parameter flags (&#96;ParamFlags&#96;)\\\\n- &#96;automatable&#96;, &#96;modulatable&#96;, &#96;hidden&#96;, &#96;bypass&#96;, &#96;is_stepped&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Smoothing (&#96;SmoothingStyle&#96;)\\\\n- &#96;none&#96;, &#96;linear(f32 ms)&#96;, &#96;exponential(f32 ms)&#96;, &#96;logarithmic(f32 ms)&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Comptime patterns\\\\n- &#96;idHash(comptime str)&#96;: FNV-1a hash for stable parameter IDs (VST3 ParamID)\\\\n- &#96;Param.defaultNormalized()&#96;: converts default to normalized [0.0, 1.0]\\\\n- &#96;Param.toPlain(normalized)&#96;: converts normalized back to plain value\\\\n\\\\n### Runtime storage\\\\n- &#96;ParamValues(N)&#96;: lock-free atomics array for normalized values\\\\n  - &#96;init(comptime params)&#96;: initializes from defaults\\\\n  - &#96;get(index)&#96;, &#96;set(index, normalized)&#96;: atomic access\\\\n- &#96;SmootherBank(N)&#96;: one smoother per parameter\\\\n  - &#96;init(comptime params)&#96;: initializes from parameter declarations\\\\n  - &#96;setTarget(index, sample_rate, plain_value)&#96;: starts smoothing\\\\n  - &#96;next(index)&#96;: returns next smoothed sample\\\\n\\\\n### Smoother implementation\\\\n- &#96;Smoother&#96;: per-parameter smoothing\\\\n  - &#96;next()&#96;: per-sample (exponential has loop-carried dependency)\\\\n  - &#96;nextBlock(out[])&#96;: optimized block processing\\\\n    - Linear: arithmetic progression (vectorizable)\\\\n    - Logarithmic: geometric progression (vectorizable)\\\\n    - Exponential: per-sample (not vectorizable)\\\\n\\\\n### Type-safe access\\\\n- &#96;ParamAccess(N, params_meta)&#96;: type-safe parameter access with comptime validation\\\\n  - &#96;getFloat(index)&#96;, &#96;getInt(index)&#96;, &#96;getBool(index)&#96;, &#96;getChoice(index)&#96;\\\\n  - &#96;nextSmoothed(index)&#96;, &#96;nextSmoothedBlock(index, out[])&#96;\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## 3. Event/Note System (&#96;src/core/events.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Core types\\\\n- &#96;NoteEvent&#96;: tagged union unifying CLAP and VST3 events\\\\n\\\\n### Note events\\\\n- &#96;note_on: NoteData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;note_off: NoteData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;choke: NoteData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;voice_terminated: NoteData&#96; (output only)\\\\n\\\\n### Per-note (polyphonic) expression\\\\n- &#96;poly_pressure&#96;, &#96;poly_tuning&#96;, &#96;poly_vibrato&#96;, &#96;poly_expression&#96;, &#96;poly_brightness&#96;, &#96;poly_volume&#96;, &#96;poly_pan&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Channel-wide MIDI\\\\n- &#96;midi_cc: MidiCCData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;midi_channel_pressure: MidiChannelData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;midi_pitch_bend: MidiChannelData&#96;\\\\n- &#96;midi_program_change: MidiProgramData&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Data structures\\\\n- &#96;NoteData&#96;: timing, voice_id, channel, note, velocity\\\\n- &#96;PolyValueData&#96;: timing, voice_id, channel, note, value\\\\n- &#96;MidiCCData&#96;: timing, channel, cc, value\\\\n- &#96;MidiChannelData&#96;: timing, channel, value\\\\n- &#96;MidiProgramData&#96;: timing, channel, program\\\\n\\\\n### Helper methods\\\\n- &#96;timing()&#96;: sample offset\\\\n- &#96;channel()&#96;: MIDI channel (or null)\\\\n- &#96;voiceId()&#96;: voice ID (or null)\\\\n\\\\n### Factory functions\\\\n- &#96;noteOn()&#96;, &#96;noteOff()&#96;, &#96;chokeNote()&#96;, &#96;voiceTerminated()&#96;\\\\n- &#96;polyPressure()&#96;, &#96;polyTuning()&#96;, etc.\\\\n- &#96;midiCC()&#96;, &#96;midiChannelPressure()&#96;, &#96;midiPitchBend()&#96;, &#96;midiProgramChange()&#96;\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## 4. Buffer Abstraction (&#96;src/core/buffer.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Core type: &#96;Buffer&#96;\\\\n- Zero-copy wrapper around host audio data\\\\n- &#96;channel_data: [][]f32&#96; (channels × samples)\\\\n- &#96;num_samples: usize&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Access strategies\\\\n\\\\n#### 1. Raw slice\\\\n- &#96;getChannel(ch)&#96;: returns &#96;[]f32&#96; for a channel\\\\n- &#96;getSample(ch, sample)&#96;: read single sample\\\\n- &#96;setSample(ch, sample, value)&#96;: write single sample\\\\n- &#96;subBuffer(scratch_channels, offset, len)&#96;: zero-copy sub-buffer view\\\\n\\\\n#### 2. Per-sample iteration\\\\n- &#96;iterSamples()&#96;: returns &#96;SamplesIter&#96;\\\\n- Yields &#96;ChannelSamples&#96; per sample index\\\\n- &#96;ChannelSamples&#96;: &#96;get(ch)&#96;, &#96;set(ch, value)&#96;, &#96;channelCount()&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### 3. Per-block iteration\\\\n- &#96;iterBlocks(max_block_size)&#96;: returns &#96;BlocksIter&#96;\\\\n- Yields &#96;BlockEntry&#96; with &#96;offset&#96; and &#96;block&#96;\\\\n- &#96;Block&#96;: &#96;getChannel(ch)&#96;, &#96;samples()&#96;, &#96;channelCount()&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Auxiliary buffers\\\\n- &#96;AuxBuffers&#96;: sidechain inputs/outputs\\\\n  - &#96;inputs: []Buffer&#96;\\\\n  - &#96;outputs: []Buffer&#96;\\\\n  - &#96;EMPTY&#96;: empty constant\\\\n\\\\n### Design notes\\\\n- Zero-copy: wrappers pass pointers directly from host buffers\\\\n- No allocations on the audio thread\\\\n- Supports SIMD-friendly access patterns\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## 5. Public API (&#96;src/root.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Re-exports\\\\n\\\\n#### Plugin interface\\\\n- &#96;Plugin&#96;, &#96;ProcessStatus&#96;, &#96;ProcessContext&#96;, &#96;EventOutputList&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Audio buffers\\\\n- &#96;Buffer&#96;, &#96;AuxBuffers&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Events\\\\n- &#96;NoteEvent&#96;, &#96;NoteData&#96;, &#96;PolyValueData&#96;, &#96;MidiCCData&#96;, &#96;MidiChannelData&#96;, &#96;MidiProgramData&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Parameters\\\\n- &#96;Param&#96;, &#96;FloatParam&#96;, &#96;IntParam&#96;, &#96;BoolParam&#96;, &#96;ChoiceParam&#96;\\\\n- &#96;FloatRange&#96;, &#96;IntRange&#96;, &#96;ParamFlags&#96;\\\\n- &#96;ParamValues&#96;, &#96;idHash&#96;, &#96;SmoothingStyle&#96;, &#96;Smoother&#96;, &#96;SmootherBank&#96;, &#96;ParamAccess&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Audio I/O layout\\\\n- &#96;AudioIOLayout&#96;, &#96;BufferConfig&#96;, &#96;ProcessMode&#96;, &#96;MidiConfig&#96;, &#96;Transport&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### State persistence\\\\n- &#96;SaveContext&#96;, &#96;LoadContext&#96;, &#96;StateVersion&#96;, &#96;writeHeader&#96;, &#96;readHeader&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Platform constants\\\\n- &#96;CACHE_LINE_SIZE&#96;, &#96;SIMD_VEC_LEN&#96;, &#96;F32xV&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### Utilities\\\\n- &#96;util&#96;: DSP utility functions\\\\n\\\\n#### Format wrappers\\\\n- &#96;ClapEntry&#96;, &#96;Vst3Factory&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Test coverage\\\\n- Runs all core module tests via &#96;std.testing.refAllDecls()&#96;\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## 6. Build System (&#96;build.zig&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n### Main function: &#96;addPlugin()&#96;\\\\nCreates shared library targets for CLAP and/or VST3.\\\\n\\\\n#### Parameters\\\\n- &#96;name: []const u8&#96;\\\\n- &#96;root_source_file: std.Build.LazyPath&#96;\\\\n- &#96;target: std.Build.ResolvedTarget&#96;\\\\n- &#96;optimize: std.builtin.OptimizeMode&#96;\\\\n- &#96;formats: PluginFormat&#96; (&#96;clap: bool&#96;, &#96;vst3: bool&#96;)\\\\n\\\\n#### CLAP build\\\\n- Creates dynamic library\\\\n- Installs as &#96;.clap&#96; extension\\\\n- Output: &#96;plugins/{name}.clap&#96;\\\\n\\\\n#### VST3 build\\\\n- Creates dynamic library\\\\n- macOS: bundle structure &#96;{name}.vst3/Contents/MacOS/{name}&#96;\\\\n  - Generates &#96;Info.plist&#96; and &#96;PkgInfo&#96;\\\\n- Linux/Windows: installs as &#96;plugins/{name}.vst3&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Module setup\\\\n- &#96;clap-bindings&#96;: &#96;src/bindings/clap/main.zig&#96;\\\\n- &#96;vst3-bindings&#96;: &#96;src/bindings/vst3/root.zig&#96;\\\\n- &#96;z_plug&#96;: &#96;src/root.zig&#96; (main framework module)\\\\n\\\\n### Example plugins\\\\n- &#96;ZigGain&#96;: &#96;examples/gain.zig&#96;\\\\n- &#96;ZigSuperGain&#96;: &#96;examples/super_gain.zig&#96;\\\\n\\\\n### Build steps\\\\n- &#96;test&#96;: runs all tests (framework, bindings, examples)\\\\n- &#96;install-plugins&#96;: installs to OS-standard directories (user/system)\\\\n- &#96;uninstall-plugins&#96;: removes installed plugins\\\\n- &#96;sign-plugins&#96;: code-signs plugins (macOS only)\\\\n\\\\n### Plugin management\\\\n- Uses &#96;build_tools/install_plugins.zig&#96;, &#96;uninstall_plugins.zig&#96;, &#96;sign_plugins.zig&#96;\\\\n- Supports &#96;--system&#96; flag for system-wide installation\\\\n\\\\n---\\\\n\\\\n## Summary of Comptime Patterns\\\\n\\\\n1. Plugin validation: &#96;Plugin(T)&#96; validates declarations and generates metadata\\\\n2. Parameter ID hashing: &#96;idHash()&#96; computes stable VST3 ParamIDs at comptime\\\\n3. Parameter lookup: sorted table built at comptime for O(log N) lookups\\\\n4. Type-safe access: &#96;ParamAccess&#96; uses comptime checks for parameter types\\\\n5. Smoothing initialization: &#96;SmootherBank.init()&#96; reads smoothing config from parameter declarations\\\\n6. Zero-copy buffers: wrappers pass pointers, no audio data copying\\\\n\\\\nThe framework uses comptime validation and generation to ensure type safety and generate format-specific metadata without runtime   "plan": "# Polyphonic Synth Example Plugin\n\n## Design\n\nA simple polyphonic synth that responds to MIDI note-on/off events and generates audio. This is the first example in the project that uses &#96;midi_input&#96; and processes &#96;NoteEvent&#96;s, making it a valuable showcase of the framework's instrument capabilities.\n\n### Synth Architecture\n\n- **16 voices** (fixed, pre-allocated array -- no heap allocation on audio thread)\n- **Waveform**: Selectable via a &#96;ChoiceParam&#96; (Sine, Saw, Square, Triangle)\n- **ADSR envelope**: Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release as &#96;FloatParam&#96;s with smoothing\n- **Master gain**: dB-scale &#96;FloatParam&#96; with logarithmic smoothing\n- **Voice stealing**: Oldest-voice-first when all 16 voices are active\n\n### Voice State Machine\n\nEach voice tracks: &#96;phase&#96; (oscillator), &#96;envelope_level&#96;, &#96;envelope_stage&#96; (idle/attack/decay/sustain/release), &#96;note&#96;, &#96;channel&#96;, &#96;velocity&#96;, &#96;voice_id&#96;. Voices in the &#96;idle&#96; stage are available for allocation.\n\n### Plugin Declarations\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;zig\npub const audio_io_layouts = &amp;[_]z_plug.AudioIOLayout{\n    z_plug.AudioIOLayout.STEREO_OUT, // No input, stereo output (instrument)\n};\npub const midi_input: z_plug.MidiConfig = .basic; // Note on/off + expression\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### Parameters (7 total)\n\n| # | Name | Type | Range | Default | Smoothing |\n|---|------|------|-------|---------|-----------|\n| 0 | Gain | FloatParam | -60..+12 dB | -6.0 | logarithmic 50ms |\n| 1 | Waveform | ChoiceParam | Sine/Saw/Square/Triangle | 0 (Sine) | none |\n| 2 | Attack | FloatParam | 1..5000 ms | 10.0 | linear 20ms |\n| 3 | Decay | FloatParam | 1..5000 ms | 100.0 | linear 20ms |\n| 4 | Sustain | FloatParam | 0..1 | 0.7 | linear 20ms |\n| 5 | Release | FloatParam | 1..5000 ms | 200.0 | linear 20ms |\n| 6 | Detune | FloatParam | 0..50 cents | 0.0 | linear 10ms |\n\n### Process Loop (per-sample)\n\n1. Read all input events, dispatch &#96;note_on&#96; -&gt; allocate voice, &#96;note_off&#96; -&gt; trigger release\n2. For each sample:\n   - Sum all active voices (oscillator * envelope * velocity)\n   - Apply master gain\n   - Write to both L and R channels (mono synth summed to stereo)\n3. Send &#96;voice_terminated&#96; output events for voices that finish their release\n\n### Key Framework Features Demonstrated\n\n- &#96;AudioIOLayout.STEREO_OUT&#96; (instrument with no audio input)\n- &#96;midi_input: MidiConfig = .basic&#96; (opting into note events)\n- &#96;context.input_events&#96; iteration with sample-accurate timing\n- &#96;context.output_events.push()&#96; for &#96;voice_terminated&#96; events\n- &#96;ProcessStatus.keep_alive&#96; (synth should never be deactivated)\n- Pre-allocated voice pool (real-time safe, no allocations in &#96;process&#96;)\n- &#96;z_plug.util.midiNoteToFreq()&#96; for pitch conversion\n- Denormal flushing with &#96;enableFlushToZero()&#96;/&#96;restoreFloatMode()&#96;\n\n## Files to Create/Modify\n\n### New: &#96;examples/poly_synth.zig&#96;\n\nThe full synth plugin implementation (~250-350 lines). Structure:\n\n1. **Voice struct**: &#96;phase: f32&#96;, &#96;freq: f32&#96;, &#96;envelope: f32&#96;, &#96;stage: enum { idle, attack, decay, sustain, release }&#96;, &#96;note: u8&#96;, &#96;channel: u8&#96;, &#96;velocity: f32&#96;, &#96;voice_id: ?i32&#96;, &#96;age: u32&#96;\n2. **Oscillator functions**: &#96;sineOsc(phase)&#96;, &#96;sawOsc(phase)&#96;, &#96;squareOsc(phase)&#96;, &#96;triangleOsc(phase)&#96; -- all pure functions of phase (0..1)\n3. **PolySynthPlugin struct**: Contains &#96;voices: [16]Voice&#96;, &#96;sample_rate: f32&#96;, &#96;next_voice_age: u32&#96;\n4. **&#96;init&#96;**: Store sample rate, zero all voices\n5. **&#96;reset&#96;**: Kill all voices (set to idle)\n6. **&#96;process&#96;**: Per-sample loop with event dispatch, voice rendering, envelope advancement, master gain\n\n### Modify: [&#96;build.zig&#96;](build.zig)\n\nAdd the new plugin target after the existing &#96;ZigSuperGain&#96; entry (around line 202):\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;zig\naddPlugin(b, .{\n    .name = \"ZigPolySynth\",\n    .root_source_file = b.path(\"examples/poly_synth.zig\"),\n    .target = target,\n    .optimize = optimize,\n    .formats = .{ .clap = true, .vst3 = true },\n});\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n",
